attributes.action: PPL & PRS(Music License) breakdown of what we pay& how much goes to artists.
attributes.background: As an organisation the PPL & PRS (The Music License) is something we all agree has to be paid, what we don’t like is their way of handling the license, they do not state what percentage goes to the artists and their accounts seem to show huge wages. A non profit organisation, with a bullish attitude

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. PPL PRS Ltd is an independent company.
